title: Recycle Track Systems acquires leading Canadian waste services provider RecycleSmart Solutions, Inc. - PR Newswire
summary: Recycle Track Systems (RTS) has acquired RecycleSmart Solutions, a Canadian provider of smart waste management technology. This acquisition expands RTS's reach across North America, offering clients a wider range of services including smart waste sensors and data-driven insights for optimizing waste and recycling processes. The acquisition emphasizes the growing role of technology in the waste and recycling industry and its contribution to sustainability goals.
